Articles.Content:
Hey,

Just saying "hello". The name is Steve, live in Alaska. A co-worker and veteran KSP player turned me on to this almost a month ago. I am a programmer (web developer), Commercial Mariner, air and space fan, raquetball player, snowboarder and all around geek. I am also a long time gamer that prefers simulation. In fact in the old days (10 years ago) I was a simulator technician for a large multi-million dollar Kongsberg Maritime simulator.

I am 42. I hope to find like minded people here (sounds like a singles ad eh? , sorry I am married).

I have a few questions I need answered, coming later. I need to get back to work before the boss catches me .

Edited August 28, 2012 by Steve Fink

Hi Steve Fink and welcome to the community, you'll find a lot of people here who will be happy to help you out, as well as a handful of older players like myself

Take a look around the forums and get stuck in, there are challenges, add-ons, irrelevant chatter and serious discussions involving maths and programming, so I'm sure you'll have fun
